text: Anne Jeffreys (January 26, 1923 - September 27, 2017) was an American actress and singer. She was known for her works in Topper, Street Scene, and the musicals Kiss Me, Kate (1948) and the musical Three Wishes for Jamie (1952). She replaced Patricia Morison in the musical Kiss Me, Kate. Jeffreys was born Annie CarmichaelUS Federal Census1930; Census Place: Goldsboro, Wayne, North Carolina; Roll: 1728; Page: 11A; Enumeration District: 12; Image: 51.0; FHL microfilm: 2341462 in Goldsboro, North Carolina on January 26, 1923. Jeffreys died on September 27, 2017 at the age of 94.Anne Jeffreys Dies: ‘General Hospital’, ‘Topper’ Actress Was 94 Deadline Hollywood, September 28, 2017 ==References== ==Other websites== * * * * Anne Jeffreys profiled in book * Huell Howser interview of Anne Jeffreys and Ann Rutherford Category:1923 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:Actors from North Carolina Category:Singers from North Carolina
title: Anne Jeffreys
